name: Ice Cream Sandwich Eating Simulator
description:
Don't you just hate Phil?  He comes over to James's house and bets him $20 he can't eat 10 ice cream sandwiches in a row.  

This game has 2 main endings, but 50 unique lines of dialogue for each sandwich you eat . . . so if you don't win the first time, your next play-through should feel fresh!
